name: Tempest
0:
”Alexa, ask Tempest how is the weather?”
”Alexa, ask Tempest what is the temperature?”
”Alexa, ask Tempest for a report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tempest
Developer Terms of Use
des: Experience the power of the Tempest skill for Amazon Alexa, your go-to for weather insights from your Tempest Weather System. Ask for your Tempest weather report and unlock a wealth of detailed information, including the current temperature, precipitation, and lightning conditions. Stay one step ahead of unpredictable weather by accessing real-time updates via your Amazon Alexa-enabled device. With the Tempest skill for Amazon Alexa, you'll always be informed and prepared for whatever Mother Nature has in store.
